channel.title: Talks on Personal space of Charanjit Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Personal space of Charanjit Singh

item.title: React/Redux Workshop
item.description: React/Redux workshop I gave with Programmers’ Club Chandigarh meetup group after seeing community’s interest in these technologies.

item.title: Modern day JS Apps (2017)
item.description: I think this was the second meetup I organized after I came back from Bangalore (to Chandigarh). It was organized with Programmers’ Club Chandigarh meetup group.

item.title: React, Redux and Reactive programming
item.description: Building a React/Redux app with a twist of Reactive programming. My first time speaking at a big conference! It was a great experience. There is a video as well! Transcript for this talk is available in its Github repository.

item.title: Jschannel RxJS workshop Nov 2015
item.description: I was very fascinated about Reactive programming, and when we had a shortage of talks in JsChannel, I decided to give a workshop on RxJS. The code used in this workshop can be found in my Github.

item.title: Meteor Js Jschannel Feb 2015
item.description: First talk I ever gave. I was new to Bangalore and all excited about the whole idea of meetup.
